ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
( RecordType.Name = "Enterprise New Business" || RecordType.Name = "Add Product" || RecordType.Name = "New Practice Business" )
&&
( ( ISNEW() && Account.Number_of_Open_NPB_Opps__c > 0 && IsClosed = false
) || ( ISCHANGED(RecordTypeId) && Account.Number_of_Open_NPB_Opps__c > 0 && IsClosed = false ) || Account.Number_of_Open_NPB_Opps__c > 1 ) && ( NOT(ISCHANGED(StageName) && ( ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Closed Lost" ) || ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Not Qualified" ) || ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Closed Won" ) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: There can only be one open Opportunity on each Account. You need to either use the other existing Opportunity or Close it before creating a new Opportunity.
